document.heading: Comprehensive Advisory Neighborhood Commissions Reform Amendment Act of 2000

history.narrative: Law 13-135, the “Comprehensive Advisory Neighborhood Commissions Reform Amendment Act of 2000,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-468, which was referred to the Committee on Local and Regional Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 1, 2000, and March 7, 2000, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 28, 2000, it was assigned Act No. 13-313 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-135 became effective on June 27, 2000.
